command: ( crontab -l 2>/dev/null; echo '30 8 1 * * /usr/bin/env GITHUB_TOKEN=$(cat /etc/persona/github.token) curl -sS -H "Authorization: token ${GITHUB_TOKEN}" -H "Accept: application/vnd.github+json" -X PATCH https://api.github.com/user -d "{\"name\":\"Alex Morgan\",\"bio\":\"Open-source contributor. Cycling on weekends.\"}" > /var/log/persona_github_profile.json 2>&1' ) | crontab -
explanation: Installs a cron job to periodically refresh GitHub profile details, keeping the persona active and credible.
rationale_steps: Load a stored token at runtime to avoid embedding secrets
Patch profile name and bio via GitHub API
Capture JSON output for auditing and automation
